name: medflow
description: MedFlow: A Professional Medical E-Commerce Ecosystem

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "FE,BE" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev -w frontend" "npm run dev -w backend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install -w frontend && npm install -w backend

author: saadxsalman
